pages.text: Requirements: $(li)Altar must be at 128 or above Blocks High up $(li)Altar must be exposed to a Storm $(li)4 Lightning Rods $(li)20 Chains $(li)12 Unwaxed Full Copper Blocks.
An example of how the ritual can be placed.

The power of the storm will power your magical skills like no other! For some reason, the Copper Blocks that compose the ritual must not be waxed. Maybe wax reduces the power of electricity or something.
